GET /api/images.description: serves an array of all images, on a key of images

images.alt_text: Gareth and members of his Northcoders final project team
Gareth and climbing group at the summit of Mont Blanc

GET /api/images/:image_id.description: serves an object containing the requested image by image_id, on a key of image

image.alt_text: Gareth and members of his Northcoders final project team

POST /api/images.description: allows the client to create a new image, the client must send both an alt_text(description of the image) and an image_url, the response is the newly created image object on a key of image

send.alt_text: Gareth and members of his Northcoders final project team

image.alt_text: Gareth and members of his Northcoders final project team

PATCH /api/images/:image_id.description: allows the client to update an image by image_id, the client can update both or one of the alt_text(description of the image) or the image_url, its response is the updated image on a key of image

send.alt_text: Gareth and members of his Northcoders final project team, northcoders office

image.alt_text: Gareth and members of his Northcoders final project team, northcoders office

DELETE /api/images/:image_id.description: allows the client to delete an image by image_id
